lead_paragraph: THOMPSON--Auazeley Roosevelt. It is with profound sorrow and the deepest sense of regret that we, the Board of Trustees and Bronx-Lebanon Hospital Center family, mourn the passing of Auazeley Roosevelt Thompson, husband of Cecille Webley Thompson, our Director of Public Relations, and father of Richard Thompson, Manager Patient Access. Memorial Service is scheduled Saturday, March 19, 2016 at 2:30pm at: Wanamaker & Carlough Funeral Home, 177 Route 59, Suffern, NY. John R. Colon, Chairman, Board of Trustees Miguel A. Fuentes, Jr., President and Chief Executive Center 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  THOMPSON, AUAZELEY ROOSEVELT
